name: Calendar Manager
description: Google Calendar management with event creation, search, agenda views, and natural language event adding across multiple accounts.

accounts.description: Google accounts to manage calendars for (shared with Gmail).

defaultTimezone.description: Default timezone for events (IANA format, e.g. America/Los_Angeles)

defaultAccount.description: Default account ID used when account_id is omitted from tool calls

accountAliases.description: Map of alias names to account IDs (e.g. {"work": "work", "personal": "xingfanxia"})
